Sister Death

2023 | 1h 45m | Horror

After a miraculous childhood, Narcisa becomes a novice and starts teaching girls in a former convent haunted by a disturbing presence.

Starring: Aria Bedmar,Maru Valdivielso,Luisa Merelas

Watch all you want.

Sister Death | Official Trailer | Netflix

In post-war Spain, Narcisa (Aria Bedmar), a young novice with supernatural powers, arrives at a former convent, now a school for girls, to become a teacher.

Sister Death (2023) - HD Ending Scene

As the days go by, the strange events and increasingly disturbing situations that torment her will eventually lead her to unravel the terrible skein of secrets that surround the convent and haunt its inhabitants
